scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --require dotenv/config --require babel-register api/tests/*
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon -r dotenv/config -r babel-register app.js
scripts.pretest: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node --require dotenv/config -r babel-register api/db/createTable.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test node --require dotenv/config -r babel-register api/db/user.seed.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test node --require dotenv/config -r babel-register api/db/admin.seed.js
scripts.posttest: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node --require dotenv/config -r babel-register api/db/dropTable.js
